author: Andy Pearson
method: For the sangrita, pour all of the sangrita ingredients into a jug and mix well. To serve, pour each of the three drinks into a shot glass, then line up the three glasses. Sip from each glass in turn - first the lime, then the tequila, and finally the sangrita.
ingredients: 700ml/ 1 pint 5fl oz tomato juice,  200ml/7fl oz orange juice,  75ml/3fl oz fresh lime juice,  8 dashes Tabasco sauce,  2 level teaspoons of cayenne pepper,  50ml/2fl oz sangrita,  50ml/2fl oz blanco Tequila,  50ml/2fl oz lime juice
